description:
In this course titled ' Hypnosis - Learn To Add Strong Points To Your Personality ' By Pradeep Aggarwal l you will learn more about your personality and the current traits you possess and require in order to have an edge over your competitors

You will learn powerful self hypnosis techniques and positive affirmations to strengthen your personality and achieve your goals in life.

You will be able to enter the state of self hypnosis and also learn the power of your subconscious mind to add strong and permanent traits in your personality.

This course is ideal for young college graduates who are looking to strengthen their personality before they step out into the real world.

This course contains more than 30 minutes of video content and designed over 8 lectures in English

This course contains -

  • Lecture1 : Introduction
  • Lecture2:Text File Exercise To Identify Which Personality Trait You Want To Acquire
  • Lecture3:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis
  • Lecture4:Conscious Mind vs Subconscious Mind
  • Lecture5:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis
  • Lecture6:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind
  • Lecture7:Positive Affirmations To Improve Your Personality
  • Lecture 8: Summary
  • Along with an affirmations handout for practical exercise.
title: Hypnosis- Learn To Add Strong Points To Your Personality
